# stableID | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ AVFoundation ](/documentation/avfoundation)

- [ AVMetricMediaRendition ](/documentation/avfoundation/avmetricmediarendition)

-  stableID 

Instance Property# stableID

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+watchOS 26.0+

```
var stableID: String? { get }
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/avfoundation/avmetricmediarendition/stableid#discussion)

Provides ID corresponding to the rendition. This is equivalent to the STABLE-RENDITION-ID in the HLS playlist. If not available, value is nil.
